languages.text: Несмотря на то, что некогда их связывал союз, Маражай более никогда ни единым словом не упоминал сво{mf|его|ю} человеческ{mf|ого|ую} покровител{mf|я|ьницу} из рода фон Валанциус. Силы, которым ныне служил{mf||а} {name}, были слишком пугающи и отвратительны даже для богопротивного ксеноса.

Though they had once been allies, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were too terrifying and repulsive even for the unholy xenos.
languages.original_text: Несмотря на то, что некогда их связывал союз, Маражай более никогда ни единым словом не упоминал сво{mf|его|ю} человеческ{mf|ого|ую} покровител{mf|я|ьницу} из рода фон Валанциус. Силы, которым ныне служил{mf||а} {name}, были слишком пугающи и отвратительны даже для богопротивного ксеноса.

traits.locale_text: Even though they have been once close, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} served now were too terrifying even for the hideous xenos.

Even though they have been once close, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} served now were too terrifying even for the hideous xenos.

Though they had once been close, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were even too terrifying and hideous for the unrighteous xenos.

Though they had once been close, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were even too terrifying and hideous for the unrighteous xenos.

Though they had once been allies, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were too terrifying and repulsive even for the unholy xenos.

Though they had once been allies, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were too terrifying and repulsive even for the unholy xenos.

languages.text: 尽管玛拉斋与他曾经的赞助人一度并肩作战，但他之后再也没提起过那位来自冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的人类赞助人。即便对毫无正义可言的异形来说，{name}所侍奉的力量也实在是过于恐怖、过于邪恶。
languages.original_text: Though they had once been allies, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were too terrifying and repulsive even for the unholy xenos.

traits.locale_text: 尽管玛拉斋与他曾经的赞助人一度很亲密，但他之后再也没提起过那位来自冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的人类赞助人。即便对毫无正义可言的异形来说，{name}所侍奉的力量也实在是过于恐怖、过于邪恶。

languages.text: Obwohl sie sich einst nahegestanden hatten, erwähnte Marazhai {mf|seinen menschlichen Schutzpatron|seine menschliche Schutzpatronin} aus der Valancius-Dynastie nie wieder. Die Mächte, denen {name} nun diente, waren selbst für den unheiligen Xenos zu furchterregend und grauenhaft.
languages.original_text: Though they had once been allies, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were too terrifying and repulsive even for the unholy xenos.

traits.locale_text: Obwohl sie sich einst nahegestanden hatten, erwähnte Marazhai {mf|seinen menschlichen Schutzpatron|seine menschliche Schutzpatronin} aus der Valancius-Dynastie nie wieder. Die Mächte, denen {name} nun diente, waren selbst für den unrechtschaffenen Xenos zu furchterregend und grauenhaft.

languages.text: Malgré leur relation passée, Marazhai ne parla plus jamais de {mf|son protecteur humain|sa protectrice humaine} de la dynastie von Valancius. Les forces que servait désormais {name} était trop terrifiantes et répugnantes, même pour le xénos impie.
languages.original_text: Though they had once been allies, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were too terrifying and repulsive even for the unholy xenos.

traits.locale_text: Malgré leur relation passée, Marazhai ne parla plus jamais de {mf|son protecteur humain|sa protectrice humaine} de la dynastie von Valancius. Les forces que servait désormais {name} était trop terrifiantes, même pour le xénos impie.

languages.text: A pesar de que una vez fueron aliados, Marazhai nunca volvió a mencionar a su patr{mf|ón|ona} human{mf|o|a} de la dinastía von Valancius. Las fuerzas a las que ahora servía {name} eran demasiado aterradores y horribles incluso para el impío xenos.
languages.original_text: Though they had once been allies, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were too terrifying and repulsive even for the unholy xenos.

traits.locale_text: A pesar de la cercana relación que una vez mantuvieron, Marazhai nunca volvió a mencionar a su patr{mf|ón|ona} human{mf|o|a} de la dinastía von Valancius. Las fuerzas a las que ahora servía {name} eran demasiado aterradores y horribles incluso para el impío xenos.

languages.text: かつては味方であったが、マラズハイはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の人間の後援者のことを二度と口にすることはなかった。{name}が今仕えている勢力は、不浄なの異種族にとってあまりにも恐ろしく、嫌悪感を抱かせるものだった。
languages.original_text: Though they had once been allies, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were too terrifying and repulsive even for the unholy xenos.

traits.locale_text: かつては味方であったが、マラズハイはフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の人間の後援者のことを二度と口にすることはなかった。{name}が今仕えている勢力は、不浄なの異種族にとってあまりにも恐ろしく、嫌悪感を抱かせるものだった。

languages.text: Bir zamanlar müttefik olmalarına rağmen Marazhai, von Valancius hanedanlığındaki insan hamisinin adını bir daha anmadı. {name} artık öylesine dehşet verici ve kan dondurucu güçlere hizmet ediyordu ki yaptıkları, zalim zenonun bile midesini bulandırıyordu.
languages.original_text: Though they had once been allies, Marazhai never mentioned his human patron from the von Valancius dynasty again. The forces that {name} now served were too terrifying and repulsive even for the unholy xenos.

traits.locale_text: Bir zamanlar müttefik olmalarına rağmen Marazhai, von Valancius hanedanlığındaki insan hamisinin adını bir daha anmadı. {name} artık öylesine dehşet verici ve kan dondurucu güçlere hizmet ediyordu ki, yaptıkları zalim zeno için bile mide bulandırıcıydı.
